name: Red Robot Run
description:
7 level 2D platfomer. 

Try to get to the end before the time runs out. Collect different gems to increase your HP or time left. If you find your time bar running low, blow up a barrel to maybe find a gem that will reset the bar and time, or to find another surprise. Be careful of the aliens and the traps and watch for a button that will disable the traps for 10 seconds. 

Controls are left, right and down arrow keys or WASD to move with down arrow or S to crouch. Spacebar to jump and left or right CTRL to shoot. ESC to pause and Q to quit but only when you reach the end. You can also get an extra jumping boost by crouching and then jumping.

Blue Gems give you 1 extra second, orange gems reset your time(usually found in barrel), green gems give you 5 seconds where you can't die unless you fall off, pink looking gems give you 1 HP, and yellow gems give you 5 HP(usually dropped by alien). 

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
